sn14.32:1–2: At Sāvatthī. "Bhikkhus, I set out seeking the gratification in the earth element. Whatever gratification there is in the earth element—that I discovered. I have clearly seen with wisdom just how far the gratification in the earth element extends.
sn14.32:3–4: "So long, bhikkhus, as I did not directly know as they really are the gratification, the danger, and the escape in the case of these four elements …as abovesn.ii.172… devas and humans.
